figo-classification-localizer.title: FIGO Classification
figo-classification-localizer.description:
Please make selection in the graphic or text.
Single selection.
figo-classification-localizer.submucousLessThan50: Submucous, <50% of the myoma is intramural
figo-classification-localizer.submucous50OrMore: Submucous, ≥50% of the myoma is intramural
figo-classification-localizer.intramuralMyomaWithContact: Intramural myoma with contact to the endometrium
figo-classification-localizer.subserousMyoma50OrMore: Subserous myoma, ≥50% of the myoma is intramural
figo-classification-localizer.subserousMyomaLessThan50: Subserous myoma, <50% of the myoma is intramural
figo-classification-localizer.subserousPedunculatedMyoma: Subserous, pedunculated myoma, not extending into peritoneal cavity
